basics.name: FU Tianlin
basics.summary: Graduate student pursuing MSc in Business Information Systems at City University of Hong Kong with a strong background in Software Engineering and Finance. Experienced in AI-powered financial systems, image processing, and EEG denoising, with multiple publications in EI-indexed journals and conferences. Skilled in full-stack development, DevOps, and data optimization, with internships in fintech and digital management platforms.

work.company: Industrial Digital Financial Services Co., Ltd.
work.position: Fintech Intern - Retail and Wealth Center Content Management Platform Construction
work.summary: Participated in requirements research for an enterprise-level marketing strategy operation management platform. Developed back-end interfaces for the Content Center, including message module CRUD functions, timed deletion tasks, and unit testing. Wrote interface documents and user help guides.

work.company: Industrial Digital Financial Services Co., Ltd.
work.position: Fintech Intern - Call Center Customer Relationship Management Platform Construction
work.summary: Assisted in designing and developing system functions based on Société Générale’s JUP platform. Optimized 168 SQL queries to improve database query speed. Participated in data standardization, cleansing, and standardizing over 600 data items. Learned and applied Docker and Kubernetes, contributing to the initial optimization of the bank’s DevOps process.

work.company: Industrial Digital Financial Services Co., Ltd.
work.summary: Developed and refined training systems, overseeing training for over 160 new employees. Conducted software requirement research for digital management platforms, enhancing course assessment frameworks. Authored a comprehensive 20,000-word analysis report on training outcomes.

education.area: Business Information Systems (Financial and Intelligent Technology Stream)

courses: Scholarships and Honors: National Scholarship of China (2023-2024, Top 0.2% Nationwide), First Prize, National Level, 17th Chinese Collegiate Computing Competition (2024), First Class Scholarship (2022-2025, three consecutive years), Excellent Class Leader & Merit Student (2021-2024, three consecutive years), Outstanding Graduate, Excellent Graduation Thesis (2024-2025)

publications.name: FinTechX: A Comprehensive AI-Powered Financial System
publications.summary: Designed system architecture based on Customer Journey Design, aligning features with user behavior stages. Built backend with Django (AI integration, quant analysis) and SpringCloud (microservices, high concurrency). Developed frontend using Vue.js for real-time data interaction. Ensured closed-loop data flow for user experience and functional coherence.

publications.name: Benchmarking Single Image Dedusting
publications.summary: Developed the Realistic Single Image Dust Removal (RSIDR) dataset for image dedusting. Conducted extensive experiments to evaluate image enhancement methods using full-reference and no-reference IQA techniques. Authored a paper analyzing results and suggesting future research directions.

publications.name: HRTS: Hierarchical Rauch-Tung-Striebel Smoother With Online Learning Priors for EEG Denoising
publications.summary: Implemented advanced Kalman filter techniques (HRTS) for EEG signal denoising with online learning-based priors. Led experimental design and data analysis, achieving significant improvements in noise reduction performance.

publications.name: Representing Scenes as Compositional Generative Neural Feature Fields Based on GIRAFFE for 3D Reconstruction of Classroom Scenes
publications.publisher: International Conference on Intelligent Information Hiding and Multimedia Signal Processing
publications.summary: Led the project as first author, leveraging the GIRAFFE framework to develop compositional generative neural feature fields, improving accuracy and efficiency in 3D reconstruction of classroom scenes.

publications.name: Research on Fast Encryption of Electronic Health Record Data Based on Privacy Protection
publications.publisher: EI Conference on IoT and Big Data Technologies for Health Care, LNICST Volume 501
publications.summary: Developed an efficient encryption algorithm for electronic health records, enhancing security while preserving user privacy. Conducted thorough testing and optimization for real-time data encryption.

research project.name: Medical AI for ECG Image Recognition
research project.description: Annotated a dataset of ECG images to train deep learning models for detecting cardiac conditions. Designed and optimized neural network models to emulate medical expert diagnostic reasoning, improving automated ECG interpretation accuracy.

research project.name: Personalized Image Aesthetics Research
research project.description: Developed a personalized image aesthetics assessment framework to evaluate image enhancement algorithms like denoising, deraining, and defogging, providing a foundation for improving algorithm performance.
